extension.name: YJ K2 Filter Module
extension.author: YouJoomla.com
extension.description:
Youjoomla YJ K2 Filter Module for Joomla 1.6x and UP
Thank you for downloading Youjoomla.com extension.
To setup your module please hover over the module parameters
and follow the instructions.
If you need support please post new thread in our Forum .
Have fun playing with your new extension :).
Youjoomla.com

field.name: module_template
field.label: Select default module template
field.description:
You can create custom layout templates for this module. Simply click the create new template button below and module engine will copy Default template and name it by the name you have selected in creation process.
You could also copy modules/mod_yjk2filter/tmpl/Default folder , rename it to your own template name and edit default.php within your template folder to your liking.
Once you have created your module template , your template name will be visible here.
For template overrides please copy your module template folder to your template/html/mod_yjk2filter/ folder and create custom overides for each module instance. To get you started we have created blank module template name New. Edit Template option can be used to customize the module template files from here.

field.name: module_css
field.label: Select default module CSS
field.description: Assign default module CSS file. You can use Edit, Upload or Create new options to customize the CSS files from here.

field.name: yjk2filter_groups_filter
field.label: Create extra fields groups filter?
field.description:
Create extra fields groups filter. Extra fields group filter allows you to combine search from more than one K2 extra fields groups. Note that extra fields names in each group should be same ie:
Group Audi field name Model
Group Bmw field Name Model

field.name: yjk2filter_rename_group
field.label: K2 Groups label
field.description: This will be first dropdown field in the form that contains names of all selected extra fields groups.

field.name: yjk2filter_groups
field.label: K2 Groups filter
field.description: Select one or more extra fields groups

field.name: yjk2filter_groups_id
field.label: Select k2 groups to be filtered
field.description: Select all or specific extra fields groups for which you want to filter an items list

field.name: yjk2filter_available_group_fields
field.label: K2 available fields selection
field.description: List of available extra fields

field.name: yjk2filter_available_group_fields_selected
field.label: Available extra fields
field.description: Available extra fields - Extra fields that belong to all of the selected groups

field.name: yjk2filter_groups_field_order
field.label: Fields order
field.description:
Order the selected fields. One field per row ie:
Field name 1
Field name 2
If left empty K2 default extra field order will take over.

field.name: yjk2filter_groups_connection
field.label: Connected searchable fields
field.description:
You can connect only dropdown extra field type so that they can populate each others fields. For example if you have field name Car make and field name Car model you can make connection between them.
One connection per row. ie:
Car make=>Car model
Location=>City

field.name: yjk2filter_create_groups_range
field.label: Create extra fields groups range?
field.description: If you have a extra field with numeric values you can setup a range filter for those values

field.name: yjk2filter_groups_range
field.label: Range values for desired field
field.description:
Create range values. One range per row. ie:
Field name 1=>1000-2000|2001-3000|3001-4000
Field name 2=>5000-6000|6001-7000|7001-8000

field.name: yjk2filter_fields_group_id
field.label: Select group first
field.description: Select the group for which you want to filter an items list

field.name: yjk2filter_extrafields
field.label: K2 Extra Fields filter
field.description: Select all or specific extra fields

field.name: yjk2filter_extrafields_id

If left empty K2 default extra field order will take over.
